content: this pattern for for a baby octopus perfect size for those tiny fingers to hold onto it can be for preemies and up you can use any yarn or hook you desire i used a g/4mm hook with ww4 100% cotton yarn there is no gauge for this little one i consider this to be an easy pattern stitches used are - magic_ring single_crochet increase decrease chain flo blo she/he works up fairly quickly uses minimal stuffing worked from the top down and all in one piece so there is no sewing required other than weaving in your ending tail and adding the facial features *if you want fuller thicker tentacles you can always work more single_crochet in the tentacle chain spaces* be sure to link your project to the pattern i may choose your image to feature on my page smile disclaimer you may not sell share or post this pattern in part or full you may sell items made using this pattern as long as you give me mixedkreations/carrey rey credit for the pattern design if you have any questions or concerns please don t hesitate to contact me and i will do all that i can to help
